0.text: Innate: Periodically, Rakan grants himself a  shield for 30 − 225 (based on level) (+ 95% AP) that lasts until broken. After being out of combat for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to maximum value.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Rakan grants himself a shield for 30 − 225 (based on level) (+ 95% AP) that lasts until broken. After being out of combat for 5 seconds, any leftover shield will be restored to maximum value.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: Rakan's basic attacks and ability hits reduce Fey Feathers'   cooldown by 1 second for each enemy  champion hit.
1.html: Rakan's basic attacks and ability hits reduce Fey Feathers'  cooldown by 1 second for each enemy champion hit.
markedPassages: cooldown
champion

2.text: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or  Xayah is channeling  Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's  Recall completes.
2.html: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or Xayah is channeling Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's Recall completes.
markedPassages: Xayah
Recall
Recall

0.text: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: If the target was an enemy  champion or epic  monster, a radius is marked around Rakan. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, Rakan  heals himself and nearby allied champions for 40 − 210 (based on level) (+ 55% AP).
1.html: If the target was an enemy champion or epic monster, a radius is marked around Rakan. After 3 seconds or if an allied champion enters the radius, Rakan heals himself and nearby allied champions for 40 − 210 (based on level) (+ 55% AP).
markedPassages: champion
monster
heals

0.text: Active: Rakan  dashes to the target location. After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Rakan dashes to the target location. After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1 second.
markedPassages: dashes
knocks them up

1.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Grand Entrance.
1.html: Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleep(bug), during Grand Entrance.
markedPassages: knocked down
immobilizing
polymorphing
sleep
possibleConcerningAbilities: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Grand Entrance.

2.text: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Rakan grants a  shield to the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
0.html: Active: Rakan grants a shield to the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.
markedPassages: shield
dashes

1.text: Recast: Rakan mimics the first cast's effects.

2.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Battle Dance.
2.html: Rakan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleep(bug), during Battle Dance.
markedPassages: knocked down
immobilizing
polymorphing
sleep
possibleConcerningAbilities: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug), during Battle Dance.

3.text: If  Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased range.
3.html: If Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased range.
markedPassages: Xayah
possibleConcerningAbilities: If  Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased range.

0.text: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  ghosting and  75% bonus movement speed for the duration. During this time, he deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and  charms and  slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
0.html: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining ghosting and  75% bonus movement speed for the duration. During this time, he deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and charms and slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
markedPassages: ghosting
75% bonus movement speed
charms
slows

1.text: Colliding with an enemy  champion extends The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds, which can occur once per champion. When Rakan collides with his first enemy champion, he gains an additional 75% bonus movement speed that decays after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Colliding with an enemy champion extends The Quickness' duration by 0.25 seconds, which can occur once per champion. When Rakan collides with his first enemy champion, he gains an additional 75% bonus movement speed that decays after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds, then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion

2.text: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.
2.html: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.
possibleConcerningAbilities: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions he did not collide with, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.

abilities.concerningText: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
Active: Rakan  dashes to the target location. After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second.
Active: Rakan grants a  shield to the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.

Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  ghosting and  75% bonus movement speed for the duration. During this time, he deals magic damage to enemies he collides with and  charms and  slows them by 75% for a duration. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Keywords

  • Gold
  • Economy

Consume

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Inspire: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INSPIRE: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Motivate: Healing, shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MOTIVATE:  Healing,  shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration
+16% heal and shield power

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INTERVENTION: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting  sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are  healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown; 1250 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown;  1250 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
